metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000098 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The net/http package's Request.ParseMultipartForm method starts writing totemporary files once the request body size surpasses the given "maxMemory"limit. It was possible for an attacker to generate a multipart requestcrafted such that the server ran out of file descriptors.

criterions.comment: golang-1.6 package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
